an3.54:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmanaparibbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmanaparibbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.54:1.2: “‘sanditthiko dhammo sanditthiko dhammo’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
an3.54:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bho gotama, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti?
an3.54:2.1: “Ratto kho, brahmana, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attabyabadhayapi ceteti, parabyabadhayapi ceteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.54:2.2: Rage pahine nevattabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, na cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.54:3.1: Ratto kho, brahmana, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.54:3.2: Rage pahine neva kayena duccaritam carati, na vacaya duccaritam carati, na manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.54:4.1: Ratto kho, brahmana, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati.
an3.54:4.2: Rage pahine attatthampi yathabhutam pajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam pajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.54:4.3: Evampi kho, brahmana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an3.54:5.2: mulho kho, brahmana, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attabyabadhayapi ceteti, parabyabadhayapi ceteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.54:5.3: Mohe pahine nevattabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, na cetasikam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.54:6.1: Mulho kho, brahmana, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto, kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.54:6.2: Mohe pahine neva kayena duccaritam carati, na vacaya duccaritam carati, na manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.54:7.1: Mulho kho, brahmana, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati.
an3.54:7.2: Mohe pahine attatthampi yathabhutam pajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam pajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.54:7.3: Evam kho, brahmana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti.
an3.54:8.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
